original_text: “Son of man, the people of Israel have become dross to me; all of them are the copper, tin, iron and lead left inside a furnace. They are but the dross of silver.
korean_text: 인자야 이스라엘 족속이 내게 찌꺼기가 되었나니 곧 풀무 불 가운데에 있는 놋이나 주석이나 쇠나 납이며 은의 찌꺼기로다

sentences.original_text: "Son of man, the people of Israel have become dross to me;
all of them are the copper, tin, iron and lead left inside a furnace.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 용광로 안에 남아 있는 구리, 주석, 철과 납이며

sentences.original_text: They are but the dross of silver."
